extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Physical Access
extracted_playbook.description: Restrict physical access to authorized individuals only to limit exposure.

extracted_playbook.title: Update SIPROTEC 5 Compact 7SX800 (CP050)
extracted_playbook.description: Update SIPROTEC 5 Compact 7SX800 (CP050) to V9.90 or later version.

extracted_playbook.title: Update SIPROTEC 5 CP150 Devices
extracted_playbook.description: Update SIPROTEC 5 7SA82, 7SD82, 7SJ81, 7SJ82, 7SK82, 7SL82, 7SX82, 7SY82, 7UT82 (CP150) to V9.90 or later version.

extracted_playbook.title: Update SIPROTEC 5 CP300 Devices
extracted_playbook.description: Update SIPROTEC 5 6MD84, 6MD85, 6MD86, 6MD89, 6MU85, 7SA86, 7SA87, 7SD86, 7SD87, 7SJ85, 7SJ86, 7SK85, 7SL86, 7SL87, 7SS85, 7SX85, 7UM85, 7UT85, 7UT86, 7UT87, 7VE85, 7VK87, 7VU85 (CP300) to V9.90 or later version.

extracted_playbook.title: Check Resilient Protection Measures
extracted_playbook.description: Operators of critical power systems should check whether appropriate resilient protection measures are in place to minimize the risk of cyber incidents impacting the grid's reliability.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Security Updates
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the provided security updates using the corresponding tooling and documented procedures. Validate updates before application and supervise the update process.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Network Access
extracted_playbook.description: Protect network access with appropriate mechanisms such as firewalls, segmentation, and VPN.

extracted_playbook.title: Configure Environment According to Guidelines
extracted_playbook.description: Configure the environment according to Siemens operational guidelines to run devices in a protected IT environment.

extracted_playbook.title: Follow Grid Security Guidelines
extracted_playbook.description: Follow grid security guidelines to enhance security measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Perform proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Cybersecurity Strategies for ICS
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.
